short_summary: Fuel cards to purchase gasoline and/or diesel fuel.
description: Ays provided per vehicle for the purchase of gasolin and/or diesel fuel
full_summary:
# Fuel Cards Tender Announcement
---

### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: cb-5668-31499827
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: 2022066
* **Publication Date**: 2023-05-18
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-06-14T14:00:00
* **Status**: Expired

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Traditional
* **Procurement Category**: GD
* **Trade Agreements**: None
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)

### Tender Description

The House of Commons (HoC) has a requirement for fuel cards to be issued on a per vehicle basis to purchase gasoline and/or diesel fuel. The tender notice, solicitation document, and tender attachments are available on the [MERX website](https://www.merx.com). There is no charge to preview the documents.

Note: The House of Commons is not responsible for any tender notices and/or related documents and attachments not accessed directly through MERX.

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Joelle Bou-Habib
* **Email**: Joelle.Bou-Habib@parl.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (613) 992-8074

### Bidder Information

Bidders must be registered on the [MERX website](https://www.merx.com) to access the tender documents.

### Delivery Information

The contract will be delivered in the Ottawa region. The contract may also be delivered in other regions covered by the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Business Classification

* **UNSPSC**: 15100000, 15101505
* **UNSPSC Description**:
	+ *Fuels*
	+ *Diesel fuel*


Please make sure to format your rewritten entry following markdown syntax as per instructions. Unfortunately, the contractor provided information does not have the detail in each field. In the rewritten, the specification on the bid process and jurisdiction is ignored. If there is a specific data which you run out of, kindly skip explaining more, assuming such field has basic explanation by government. Note that UNSPSC followed the Government standard and it follows that UNSPSC format as per the contractor rules. 
Finally, skip the field where details is not provided because some remarks is ignored,  also interpretation not required which has redundant, specific data also leading business models and commercial detailing order terminology
